import requests

url = "https://collectionword.p.rapidapi.com/previes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "collectionword.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
